about_the_game:
The SlimeTime experience consists of two parts; a Single Player story that will unfold in multiple episodes as well as multiplayer PvP and Coop game modes.

STORY MODE:
Episode 1: Escape (Note: This will be the only episode available on release)
Episode 2: Investigation
Episode 3: Revenge

You wake up in a cell, unsure how you got there but certain you need to escape. Search your surroundings for a way out as quickly as possible. There are no save games or checkpoints - each episode playthrough must be completed without stopping. Compete for the best times, in game leader boards will show who has the best ..."Slime Time".

MULIPLAYER MODES
Cummies: Deathmatch (Note: This will be the only mode available on release)
SlimeBall: Soccer, but with a splash of Cummies.
SlimeKart: BattleRacing Fun, Cum-Style.

Multiplayer modes will be fluid, this is the area where we will be experimenting the most. The MP modes have very little to do with the Story Mode, besides characters.

*************************************************************************************************************************
Please note, this is our first title and in addition to improving it as time goes on, we will also be using it to test out modes/gameplay elements in upcoming releases. We will post news bulletins on when we are conducting these types of tests - feedback is always encouraged.
*************************************************************************************************************************

content_descriptors.notes: Please note there is no human nudity/explicit content. There's actually only one character 'SexCrimer' whose "man-like" parts will be visible (and they are not detailed, looks like a green coke can). This is not a game you play with one hand (well maybe, I don't know what you are into). The only sexual act depicted here is a simulated "ejaculation" to pass the Tag from players. Currently there is no 'gore' but we do have plans on a death animation - imagine the cover of 'Load'..
